name: Combat Guardian Angel 3
description:
This project was made for a one-week game jam, but I'm planning on expanding upon it!

Features in this version:
  • 3 playable characters
  • Badge collecting
  • Choices that affect the progress of the game
Planned features:
  • 6 playable characters
  • New Badge collecting
  • Custom Difficulty Level (novice, intermediate, expert)
